Race.SpecificTitle: PW Amb. Serv. Dist. No. 1 -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Ambulance Service District No. 1)
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 5 mills property tax renewal for improving, maintaining and operating ambulance service for the Ambulance Service District No. 1 of the Parish of LaSalle, including acquiring equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall Ambulance Service District No. 1 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $254,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating ambulance service for the District, including acquiring equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No.1 -- 9.53 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 1 Proposition 
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 9.53 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving
and maintaining public roads and bridges within Road District No. 1 of the
Parish of LaSalle.
Race.FullText:
Shall Road District No. 1 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the
"District"), levy a nine and fifty-three hundredths (9.53) mills tax on all the
property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $50,030 reasonably
expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year),
for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with
the year 2020 for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public
roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: LaSalle Rec. Dist. #5 -- 5.07 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
LaSalle Recreation District #5 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 5.07 mills property tax continuation for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities and equipment, including necessary land and buildings, for LaSalle Recreation District #5.
Race.FullText: Shall LaSalle Recreation District #5 of LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District") levy a five and seven hundredths (5.07) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $36,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities and equipment, including necessary land and buildings, for the District?
